    • isEnabled

      public boolean isEnabled()
      Is this attack instance enabled.
      Gibt zurück:
      Indicates whether this attack instance is enabled or not.

    • shouldDo

      protected boolean shouldDo(int percentage)
      Should something be done based on the given percentage chance.
      Parameter:
      percentage - Chance percentage (0-100).
      Gibt zurück:
      Returns 'true' if the action should be performed, returns 'false' otherwise.

    • hurt

      protected void hurt(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity victim, org.bukkit.entity.Monster monster, float hurtAnimation, float damage)
      Artificially hurts the player to simulate damage. 
           
     // The entity being hurt
     LivingEntity victim = ...;

     // The monster causing the damage
     Monster monster = ...;

     // Apply 4 damage with a hurt animation strength of 0.5
     hurt(victim, monster, 0.5f, 4.0f);
      Parameter:
      victim - The entity being hurt.
      monster - The monster causing the damage.
      hurtAnimation - The strength of the hurt animation.
      damage - The amount of damage to apply.

    • pushBack

      protected void pushBack(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity victim, org.bukkit.Location pushingFrom, double strength, double y)
      Pushes the victim away from the pusher with the specified strength and vertical velocity. 
           
     // The entity being pushed
     LivingEntity victim = ...;

     // The location from which the push originates
     Location pushingFrom = monster.getLocation();

     // Push the victim away with a strength of 1.0 and an upward velocity of 0.5
     pushBack(victim, pushingFrom, 1.0, 0.5);
      Parameter:
      victim - The entity being pushed.
      pushingFrom - The location from which the push originates.
      strength - The strength of the push.
      y - The value the player gets pushed upwards.

    • shouldIgnorePlayer

      protected boolean shouldIgnorePlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Determines if the player should be ignored or not.
      Parameter:
      player - The player to check.
      Gibt zurück:
      Returns 'true' if the player should be ignored, returns 'false' otherwise.

    • sound

      protected void sound(org.bukkit.Location location, String soundName, float volume, float pitch)
      Plays a sound at the given location.
      Parameter:
      location - Location to play the sound at.
      soundName - Name of the sound to play.
      volume - Volume of the sound. (1.0 - 10.0)
      pitch - Pitch of the sound. (0.0 - 2.0)

    • sound

      protected void sound(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.Location location, String soundName, float volume, float pitch)
      Plays a sound at the given location for a certain player.
      Parameter:
      player - Player to hear the sound.
      location - Location to play the sound at.
      soundName - Name of the sound to play.
      volume - Volume of the sound. (1.0 - 10.0)
      pitch - Pitch of the sound. (0.0 - 2.0)

    • particle

      protected void particle(org.bukkit.Location location, org.bukkit.Particle particle, int amount, double x, double y, double z, double speed)
      Spawns particles at the given location.
      Parameter:
      location - Location to spawn the particles at.
      particle - Particle type to spawn.
      amount - Amount of particles to spawn.
      x - X distribution over time.
      y - Y distribution over time.
      z - Z distribution over time.
      speed - Speed of the particles.

    • particle

      protected void particle(org.bukkit.Location location, org.bukkit.Color color, float size, int amount, double x, double y, double z, double speed)
      Spawns colored dust particles at the given location.
      Parameter:
      location - Location to spawn the particles at.
      color - Color of the dust particles.
      size - Size of the dust particles. (1 - 50)
      amount - Amount of particles to spawn.
      x - X distribution over time.
      y - Y distribution over time.
      z - Z distribution over time.
      speed - Speed of the particles.

      value - Default value.
      Gibt zurück:
